description: This Dart file defines an EventsProvider class for managing and exposing a list of events within a Flutter application. It interacts with a DataSource to load event data asynchronously and notifies listeners upon updates.

classes.name: EventsProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier to hold and manage a list of MaintenanceEvent items, allowing for reactive updates in a Flutter UI.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches events using the dataSource and updates the internal items list, then notifies listeners of the change.
